TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Letsie_III, title = Letsie_III, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Letsie_III} }

S.FORM: Letsie III I 1963 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 17 a romi'ad masofoc ci Letsie III, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Lesotho anini i ci Letsie III, patirengan a romi'ad i 1996 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 7 a romi'ad.

Letsie III I 1963 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 17 a romi'ad masofoc ci Letsie III, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Lesotho anini i ci Letsie III, patirengan a romi'ad i 1996 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 7 a romi'ad.
